creator: Giard, Robert, 1939-2002
title: Desk files, weekly calendars, grant proposals, resumes, professional correspondence, exhibition announcements and brochures, obituaries, awards, articles, plans for future projects
rights: The materials are open for research.

abstract: The papers consist of photographs, correspondence, diaries, financial papers, and printed materials documenting Robert Giard's career as a photographer and personal life, spanning the years 1972 to 2002. The bulk of the papers contain photographic prints by Giard in several sizes of various subjects, including portraits of gay and lesbian writers, landscapes, nudes, still lifes, and portraits of the Thanks Be To Grandmother Winifred Foundation grant recipients.
